game.letAiPlay: Let the AI play for you
game.rule1: Play a card matching the discard pile's color, number, or symbol.
game.rule2: If you can't play, you must draw a card.
game.rule3: After drawing, you can play the drawn card if it's valid.
game.rule4: If you still can't play after drawing, your turn ends (click End Turn).
game.rule5: Wild cards can be played on any color. You choose the next color.
game.rule6: Wild Draw 4: Choose the next color. The next player draws 4 cards and loses their turn.
game.rule7: Draw 2: Next player draws 2 and loses their turn.
game.rule8: Reverse: Reverses the direction of play.
game.rule9: Skip: Skips the next player's turn.
game.rule10: When you have one card left, click the "UNO!" button before playing your second-to-last card.
game.rule11: First player to empty their hand wins the round!
game.matchTopCard: Match the top card by color, number, or symbol.
game.clickDrawPile: Click the draw pile (deck icon) if you can't play.
game.playDrawnCard: Play the drawn card if possible, otherwise click 'End Turn'.
game.wildDraw4Rule: Wild Draw 4: Choose color, next player draws 4.
game.unoRule: Click "UNO!" button when you have one card left.
game.firstToWin: First to play all cards wins!
